document_data.name: ''Brewbanks Family Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Brewbanks family shield''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[shield]] wielded by [[Wilfred Brewbanks]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The shield was enchanted with simple ''+1'' defensive magics and each strike blocked by it returned a small potion of damage dealt back at the attacker. ''Brewbanks family shield'' was a small round metal shield decorated with an image of the sun and colored in silver and blue.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, ''Brewbanks family shield'' had been passed down through generations of the Brewbanks family. However, Wilfred Brewbanks, the shield's last owner, did not hold the heirloom in much regard, ready to sell it an interested party during his trip along the [[Trade Way]] to the city of [[Luskan]] with [[Tollin]]'s caravan.
